title: The Keys to Delivering Happiness in Business
itunes:title: The Keys to Delivering Happiness in Business
description:
Jenn Lim, Co-Founder and CEO of Delivering Happiness, discusses her book "Beyond Happiness: How Authentic Leaders Prioritize Purpose and People for Growth and Impact.”

Hosts: Carol Massar and Tim Stenovec. Producer: Paul Brennan.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
